item.title: CVE-2021-3854|2024-08-03T17:09:09.565Z -- glox%20technology -- useroam%20hotspot
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Glox Technology Useroam Hotspot allows SQL Injection.Â This issue affects Useroam Hotspot: before 5.1.0.15.
